casebody.data:
BAILEY
v.
WINSTON-SALEM STATE. No. 549P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. John P. Scherer, II, Assistant Attorney General, for Winston-Salem State University.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of December 2008 by Plaintiff for Review of the Opinion of the Court of Appeals:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
